org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth

Class BluetoothLeHandler.GeneralCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback
      • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth.BluetoothLeHandler.GeneralCallback
  • Enclosing class:
    BluetoothLeHandler

    private class BluetoothLeHandler.GeneralCallback
extends android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback
    Class handling all callbacks from bluetooth devices.

      • onConnectionStateChange

        public void onConnectionStateChange(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt gatt,
                                    int status,
                                    int newState)
        When a connection state changes, call the callback associated with the given GATT server. If the newState is BluetoothProfile.STATE_CONNECTED, service discovery for the given GATT service is also initiated.
        Overrides:
        onConnectionStateChange in class android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback

      • onServicesDiscovered

        public void onServicesDiscovered(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt gatt,
                                 int status)
        When services for a GATT server are discovered, check whether the given GATT server matches all associated BluetoothLeHandler.gattRequirements. If it does not pass the test, the device is disconnected. Finally, the callback associated with the given BluetoothGatt are executed. NB: in case of failed requirements test, status passed to the callback will be BluetoothLeHandler.GATT_FAILS_REQUIREMENTS.
        Overrides:
        onServicesDiscovered in class android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback
